You must be the size of an insect, and yet the device is still regular-sized, rendering it completely inoperable by you at your present scale. Looking back, wincing inwardly at every one of the young giant's thunderous footfalls, you notice that the device is gone.

What? But how - No, it doesn't matter. There'll be time enough to find it later. For now, you'e going to have to try and find a regular-sized person to help you out of this predicament. And for that you have several options.

The obvious one is the paper boy. You've had issues with him in the past, with him breaking the window once with a carelessly tossed Local Times, but there's no one nearer that you can think of.

Of course, being in your own front garden you could endeavour to find someway back into the house, where you're comfortable and familiar, and try to make use of your own telephone.

But the house is so formidable now, and you did close your door behind you (again, in your head: Stupid!). Perhaps now would be a good time to go and re-acquaint yourself with the next-door neighbours? They seem like friendly sorts, and even if they did refuse to invite you to their last barbecue they couldn't possibly turn their backs on someone so vulnerable, could they?

Or, you could cast your gaze further, across the street. There's that young woman who recently moved in, living alone, who you've had your eye on for some time. She's so beautiful, but you've never worked up the courage to ask her out. This may be strange, but it's certainly a good opening line.

The final option would be to march out into the street and see what random people the day brings you while you try and find out where the gun went all on your tiny lonersome. Yeah, good luck with that if you try it.

prostitution and violent crime (find some transportation)
1222212121.content:
You've decided the best way to atone for the evil you've done that led to the death of Clara is to devote the rest of your life to ridding the world of crime and injustice. Your neighborhood is middle-income, and there isn't much crime here to speak of. You look around to see any sort of crime going on that may need to be remedied.

You see three teenagers sitting on the sidewalk smoking & passing around a bong. Marijuana is illegal; but perhaps this crime is too trivial to warrant shrinking?

Meanwhile, at a nearby intersection a young mother is pushing a carriage when suddenly an enormous SUV occupied by a young family runs the red light and nearly hits her and her baby!

You sigh. You were hoping being a superhero would involve more excitement than this. Perhaps you should venture to the other side of town where prostitutes are known to work the streets and gangs and thugs reign supreme? With no experience, are you prepared for the dangers you would face in the bad end of town?

You decide it would be best to start off your new career as a superhero by punishing....
1222212121.title: Beginning your new career

1222212122.content:
Something inside your brain must have snapped when Maria Purdey crushed a helpless girl beneath her toes. Of course you are responsible for her being in the shoe, but you had done everything you could to stop her demise - but you failed. You felt shock at first, but now you feel thrill and excitement and a hunger for more. Clutching the shrink ray inside your pocket, you look around for your next victim.

You hear a ruckus far down the street and head in that direction. Signs on utility posts guide you, and inform you that where you are heading is a birthday party you weren't invited to for some kid you don't know.

The yard is decorated with balloons and other appropriate decorations, and numerous vehicles fill the front yard and are lined up down the street. "No one will notice anything suspicious about me", you think as you sneak around the picket fence and peek into the backyard.

Through a gap in the fence you see children of different ages sitting in a circle around an area of the asphalt driveway where two clowns are performing to the children's amusement. All the other adults are in the house.

Though it is difficult to make out from the baggy clothes and makeup, you can kinda tell that the more diminuitive blue-haired clown is a woman. She is standing there not doing much at the moment. The other clown is larger and has a wig of bright green hair. His face and costume are made up in a style that is typical of clowns.

You watch as he crafts long inflated balloons into various animal shapes. One child (who you presume to be the birthday boy) does not appear to be amused by this, as indicated by the bitter expression on his face.

Noticing this, the large clown bends down in the face of the kid and says in an obnoxious sounding voice that clowns have, "Aw, what is the matter William? I think you need to cool off." As he said this, he squirted the kid in the eye with his flower lapel.

Many of the kids laughed at this, but William did not look amused. The green haired clown tried a different tactic, and recited a joke in his obnoxious voice, "Does anyone here know what you always get on your birthday?" There was a moment of silence, as no one knew the answer. The clown then said, "Another year older!"

Some of the younger children laughed, but most were not amused by this and some began to leave. So the slightly smaller evidently female clown with the blue wig produced a miniature unicycle from her oversized pants pocket and began pedaling it around. This kept most of the kids from getting bored and leaving, but their antics were still pretty dull.

You laugh to yourself as you think of a way you can add some hilarity to young William's birthday party. You can't wait to view the imminent comedy as you pull our your gun. With the shrink ray securely in your grasp, you carefully aim and fire from your hiding place...
1222212122.title: Clowning Around

choices: Shrink the other clown as well.
Your job is done. Time to find someone else to shrink.
12222121221.content:
'Bull's eye' The ray hits the despicable clown in the back of his green wig. Suddenly the entertainer's garments are getting even baggier as he looses inches and then feet. His partner watches him go a look of helpless consternation visible through her white face paint. Many of the children have returned as well and some who've been put to sleep by the clown's antics now awake. They all watch the dwindling man mouths similarly agape. Only the adults, milling beside a faraway punch bowl, are painfully unaware.

William, the birth day boy, leans over to see the performer's head dissapear down the collar of his shirt. He watches the bulges where beneath a man struggled with his own undershirt and started laughing.
12222121221.title: Reducto the Clown

choices: Somewhere where she could hack it as a borrower
124.content:
Oh shit. Oh shit! Oh fannyfucking arse fucktits! You shrunk this young girl who's now squirming around in your hand and screaming like a really small mouse. It's your fault. Yours. You did it.

No! It was the fault of whoever left that crazy gun lying around. How thae hell were you supposed to know this would happen? You look pittyingly at the tiny wriggling girl and feel awful... and scared. You have to get rid of her!

The sun warms you and the breeze makes eerie noises as it rustles the branches of the trees and you stand holding a tiny girl who you just accidently shrank and actually are actually thinking of desposing of her like a used tissue.

This is awful. You hold her up to your ear. She's crying. "Please help me! Please! Don't hurt me. I'll do anything. I'll never tell anyone. Just don't hurt me!"

This is really awful. You see someone approaching, a mother with a pushchair and panic. You shove the tiny girl into your pocket and try to look like you are waiting for somebody and not being shady.

This is terrifying! But how terrifying must it be for her? You remember your aunt's advice. "You can't help anyone unless you help yourself."

Okay. You have to get rid of her. But where?
124.title: That Awkward Moment

1243.content:
You gently remove the tiny blonde haired girl from your pocket and look her over. The tiny 10-year-old is scared to death as she shivers in the palm of your enormous hand. At her size, you can still see some of her features. She has long strawberry blonde hair, fair skin, and an athletic, well-defined body for her age. Feeling a bit sorry for her but at the same time not wanting to be caught, you use the shrink gun and increase her size to nearly 3 inches or 7.6 cm tall. However, you pressed a new button that makes her nearly 3 inches tall, but unfortunately, it also vaporizes all of her clothes. The tiny scared girl naturally squeals in embarrassment and attempts to hide her privates from your lustful gaze. Curiosity however gets the better of you, and you naturally check her out, thinking she has a nice ass. Then it hits you, not only did you shrink the little girl, but also she is completely naked now. Great, they will send me away to prison for sure.

Lust is replaced by panic, and some stupidity. You place the scared naked girl in your shirt pocket and look for a place to safely put her. You could eat her but decide against it for now. You see a nearby fence that surrounds the local university and you decide to get rid of her there. There is also a pet store next door. You are about to leave her there, when for some strange reason you want her to have some company. You quickly look around and see an 11-year-old white boy that looks a lot like her walking around. The boy has blonde hair too, and he has a lean, well-defined body. Maybe he is the girl’s older brother or just a local kid he did not recognize. You still do not know everybody in the neighborhood. You also see the girl’s mom, a gorgeous 32-year-old white woman walking around looking for her. The girl’s mom is named Amber, and she has blonde hair and a healthy body too.

As the boy walks around the area, you see Amber walking over to the young boy and a teenage couple also. The couple is in their early teens you think, and they are out for a walk. The young couple is white and attractive. As the four people stand around looking over at you, you panic, point the gun at them, and fire. A second later, they all vanish. You run over to them, and look down to see four tiny 3-inch tall people staggering around. They are still clothed, so you point the gun at them again, press the new button and all of their clothes vanish from sight, but they are still around 3 inches tall. As the four tiny naked people panic, you gently grab them and release them near the fence. You release Clara too and she joins the group. You watch as all five of the nearly 3 inch tall humans run through the grass together in their birthday suites towards an uncertain fate.

At this point, we follow whom?
1243.title: Tiny, naked and free!

125.content:
Okay, this is bad. You found what you thought was a silly toy and you somehow have shrunken an innocent girl down to the size of an insect and she's in your hand (understandably) freaking out. She knows you did it and lives in the same street. She may even know your address. Killing her would be easy but it's really wrong but if you let her go she will probably tell people what you did. You could try to figure out how to use the gun to restore her, but it's confusing and you could end up shrinking her even more.

This is too much even for you. You need help. But who can you call?
125.title: Bad

13.content:
When you pull the trigger the gun shudders and let's rip a deafening screech. You're blown backwards as the 'toy' explodes in a halo of blinding light! The very earth shakes, nearby windows break. You are lying on your back on the pavement looking into the sky and for some reason a blackbird flying overhead seems to suddenly accelerate like a jet plane and the clouds in the sky seem to expand and race apart! Your stomach seems to leap as if you were falling and a dizzying wave of vertigo hits.

Car alarms are going off over the ringing in your ears and you hear raised voices in nearby houses. A girl across the street has been knocked over too and the road is burnt black under the place the gun seemingly exploded. Cars seem to have shifted and are at zig-zaggy angles or in the middle of the road.

What the HELL just happened? The girl across the street, Clara from next door seems okay. She's standing now and shaking her mobile phone. Clearly no signal. You walk shakily back up the front path and go back inside. You want to switch on the local radio station and see what they have to say.

The radio is dead. So, it turns out is the TV. A power cut too! That must have been some quake! You aren't even supposed to GET earthquakes here!

Of course what you didn't know then, but soon would was that the entire city had just shrunk to a fraction of it's normal size! You and everyone else are about to find this out in the worst way possible.... because somebody from outside the blast area is walking towards your tiny town...

But who?
13.title: Small town disaster!

choices: Putting something else in her mouth
131.content:
April Collins was out in her backyard making preparations for a neighborhood BBQ with her two daughters, Cindy and Amy. Her husband, Jim, and her other children were in the house watching tv and none of them noticed the nearby flash. Except for Cindy. Cindy was the eldest of April's children, at 20, but she was born mentally handicapped. To all who looked at her, she was a normal looking woman, but she had the limited mind of a small child and was unable to speak and required a diaper.

The Collins' yard was fenced in, and it was normally impossible for Cindy to wander out onto the road, but today something strange happened and half the yard (including the house and all inside it) mysteriously disappeared. Cindy took this opportunity to explore.

Some time passed before anyone noticed. It wasn't until her slightly younger sister Amy, who was lounging in the pool, had tried changing the radio to the local station and noticed it didn't come in that she looked over and seen that the entire town, including their house and half their yard, was gone!

"Mom! Our house disappeared! The entire town is gone!", Amy cried out and jumped out of the pool. Her body was dripping chlorinated water, and visibly trembling from shock.

April was getting the cleaning the grill out for the BBQ when she heard her daughter shouting. Her jaw dropped from the shock of what she seen when she turned around. Most of their backyard was intact, but not far from their house, and for nearly as far as the eye could see, everything was missing. The roads, houses, businesses, everything. But she could see that her mentally handicapped daughter had wandered off near the center of the circle of nothing. "Cindy!", she screamed in fear. Dropping what she was doing, she ran off towards her.

Amy followed close behind; her long blonde hair and green two-piece bathing suit created a trail of chlorinated pool water in her wake as it cascaded down from her running body. As she and her mother got within about 50 ft of Cindy they could see what happened to the town. It didn't disappear; it had shrunk! Most homes weren't much larger than a pack of cigarettes, and the miniature people were no bigger than ants! The two looked on in horror as Cindy reached for something that caught her attention...

Jim Collins and his kids had been indoors watching a sitcom as his wife and two daughters got things in order for the BBQ Jim was preparing to host. The show they were viewing whoever was interrupted by a flash that Jim noticed out the window with the corner of his eye. At that same moment, the tv and all electrical appliances in the house went dead as if the power went out. He went to the basement to check the fuse box, but seen that to be in order and was heading back upstairs when the whole house started to shake. He got upstairs and looked out the window and nearly fainted at what he seen. It was his daughter, Cindy, but she was huge! Big, or maybe even bigger than the largest mountain! Jim's kids, who were also in the house, screamed in terror at the sight of their enormous older sibling.

The colossal girl looked around with curiousity at the spectacle of a miniature town in front of her, thinking it was nothing more than a toy for her amusement. One of the tiny houses in particular soon caught her attention. It kinda reminded her of her own home, and with a smile she reached for it.

Jim added his voice to the chorus of screams as his daughter's green eyes locked directly onto him, and her enormous hand reached down. The house shook and made various sounds as it was uprooted from its foundation and lifted hundreds of feet into the sky before the smiling face of Cindy. She looked it over for a moment, but not knowing what else to do with it she opened her mouth and shoved the house inside.

"No, Cindy! Put us down, our home is not a toy!" Jim screamed, as he and his home were shoved into her cavernous maw.

Cindy's mouth began to involuntarily salivate as her pallate experienced the unfamiliar taste of the shrunken structure. Unlike wood or siding in their normal state, the shrunken materials dissolved easily in the powerful acids of her saliva. Jim and his children could see some of Cindy's and her gums with the small amount of light that poured in from outside. Adding to their fear, they noted that each molar was larger than a car, and there were ropes of spittle that could hold up a suspension bridge!

Not knowing what else to do, the giant girl began to bite down on her toy. The house began to buckle and split apart, and Jim and his kids huddled together in the center of the room as debris fell around them from the collapsing ceiling, and saliva began to ooze in from the crushed walls.

Cindy didn't like the bitter taste of the house, so she rid her mouth of it by...
131.title: Put us down, we're not a toy!

choices: You desperately try to salvage the situation
Let's look to the girls above...
The safety override kicks in restoring you alone to normal size
132.content:
You're unaware of just how much of the surrounding area has been affected by your 'accident', but you're soon imminently, irrevocably aware of just how small you've made it.

The earthquakes hint at it. The looming shadow gives you more of an inkling. But it is the fatal presence of that foot that confirms it.

A tremendous pall of dust scatters forth from the crushed remains of however many buildings just got stepped on, and the screaming of your friends and neighbours almost rises above the boom of the ensuing shockwave.

For yourself, you are frozen in place, staring up and up the sheer face of the shoe that rises upward. It's a couple of blocks away from you, yet still you crane your neck back to try and find its topside.

When you do, you realise that it's actually a sandal. Gargantuan toes rest upon it, many of which are taller than the platform upon which they stand. Given that the sole of the flip-flop is around twenty storeys alone, that makes the full height of this person beyond what you can quickly calculate.

And there's still another foot out there somewhere. Turning in the correct direction, you see it rising more more ruins, making your quaint town seem like little more than a piled heap of sand grains before its awesomeness. And while they remain steady, more rumbling indicates that other people - other giants, to you and your shrunken kind - are moving out there, causing untold destruction.

You've got to reverse this - you've got to check out that machine again, to undo what you did before these people squash you all underfoot. Or worse.
132.title: Beyond Comprehension

134.content:
As a strange twist of fate, the person closest to the blast who wasn't effected by it turned out to be a celebrity.

She was walking in the outskirts of the town when the blast hit, and was amazed to see the entire town had vanished without a trace, leaving nothing but a large circle of empty earth which she stood just beyond the boundary of.

Though it was too small to make out from where she stood, it seemed as though there was some strange objects in the center of the circle where the town once stood. Intrigued, and ever the curious one, she disregarded her own safety and walked towards the objects.

As she approached, her mouth dropped open and she gasped in amazement to see that the objects were actually structures of the vanished town!

The celebrities name is...
134.title: Titan Celeb Discovers Tiny Town

choices: Call a few friends over to share the fun
1342.content:
Well, well, well, Angelina thought to herself. What the fuck was going on here?

Squatting to get a closer look, she ran one of her fingers along what seemed to be the main street of the town, rupturing its shrunken pavement beneath her fingernail without even meaning to. The place was a lot more fragile that it looked.

Rising to her feet, Angelina flicked the crumbs of dirt from her nail while pondering what to do with her discovery. There were people she knew that would be really excited about this place - maybe she should contact them. On the other hand, the thought of having an entire town at her mercy, with no one else to interfere, was sort of appealing in and of itself. Already she lifted a foot above one of the nearer buildings, leaving it hanging there and imaging the delicious fallout from letting it drop.

She would have to decide quickly, whether or not she wanted to share her new toys...
1342.title: Bad Girl Needs Friends?

choices: Break off a manageable chunk of the town and leave the rest
Order the townsfolk to evacuate into her Bra
Idea! Order them into her shoes and socks.
13422.content:
She decided she was going to keep the city for herself. It was very auspicious that she was the only one within sight of the town that had not shrunk with it, so she couldn't pass up the opportunity. Her heart beat in excitement as she felt a rush of power, and contemplated the many things she could do to the town, or force the town's inhabitants to do for her.

There was just one problem - the town was too large to simply carry with her bare hands. Also, any attempt to lift things up would create enormous damage to the fragile structures. She could carry off a portion of the town in her hands. This would probably be enough to satisfy her interests, but she would have to leave much of the city behind, and maybe someone would see her and alert the authorities.

Another option would be to just haul off the town's inhabitants and leave the structures behind.But what would she transport them in? Her purse is full of large accessories that would crush most of the tiny people. the only thing on her large enough to hold the city's population is her bra. She could order the tiny people to get into her bra cups and carry them all off in that.

So, what does she do?
13422.title: Angelina makes another adoption

choices: Try to change the settings on the gun and turn them back
Take the bus to the police
Promise to look after them for the rest of your life
15.content:
You feel like the bottom just dropped out of reality when you see that the school bus, which was parked near the bus stop suddenly disappeared before your eyes. You look around, expecting to see an angry crowed approaching you, calling you a murderer, but to your astonishment, you see no one else around. Well, there are a few people around, but they have noticed nothing. You quickly run over to the area the bus was parked. Excepting to see something, wreckage, dust, a burnt shadow, something, you look on. Instead, you see nothing, except for something small, and white just lying they're on the ground, where the bus once was. At first, it looked like a toy but as you got closer, you saw that it looked just like a bus, only smaller.

The bus is about seven inches, or 17.8 cm long. Curious, you picked it up, and looked inside. To your amazement, you saw about thirty tiny creatures looking back at you in shock. No, they are not bugs at all; they are girls,tiny girls, who are 10 to 11 years of age. They all stood around 2.2 cm tall. As you look inside the minibus at them, you believe they are all students at the local Catholic school for girls, because of their black, and white uniformed dresses. You then look around; to make sure that there is nobody else is around, watching you. You then begin to panic over what you've done. What are you going to do?
15.title: The Mini Catholic Girls School bus

choices: It's that nice Mrs Purdey from next door.
It's a gang of obnoxious teenage girls.
It's some guy you don't know.
153.content:
You slump down on the garden path, the tiny bus in your lap. You are utterly deflated. What the hell just happened to your life? You're a regular guy, aren't you? You don't even fuck with oija boards! How the hell did this happen!

You stare straight ahead trying to get your thoughts together.

Busload of girls. Check. Okay.

Must help girls. Check. Okay.

Girls are, like, an inch high if that.

.........................


Look at bus.

Look straight ahead again.

You shuffle forward onto the pavement and put the bus full of ... (DON'T THINK ABOUT IT!!!!!) down near you.

Can't think. Shock.

Thump. Thump. Thump.

Someone is walking along the pavement towards you.
153.title: ????Huh woohoo ek ak(*^(IUGVMHTDhuh???

choices: Ignore them and hope they carry on down the street.
Make a grab for the bus
1532.content:
You look behind you to see four teenage girls, two black, one white, and one Asian, around 16 years old, heading in your direction. You watch as they laugh, scream, and push each other around. You then watch as they now scream at you, 'Hay man, you're a little old to be playing with toy trucks.'

You try to ignore them, but they are now surrounding you. As they heckle you,[addition by Benway:] you feel tense. You hate this, as you never know how to deal with teenage girls. You guess they won't listen to anything you say and it's not like you can get physical with a bunch of young girls! Gangs are the worst. They encourage each other.

"Loser!" calls the white girl and her friends laugh like it was a really clever joke. The bus is closer to them than to you and you're pretty worried.

What to do?
1532.title: Gang of four girls

15322.content:
"Get lost!" you say, trying to sound as firm as you can.

They break up laughing. "OOOO," says the black girl in the Reeboks, "I'm soooo scared of some guy who plays with toys!"

"What you gonna do about it?" sneers the white girl, "You scared we'll break your toys?"

"Fuckin' gay! C'mon then!" taunts the other black girl.

This isn't working. You lean forward and reach for the bus. You can see tiny faces pressed fearfully against the glass, their vehicle shadowed by giant legs.

BAM! A white sandaled foot stomps down on the roof of the bus, shattering the windows bursting the tires, and breaking the suspension. The frame buckles alarmingly and you hear a barely audible scream under the girls sneering and laughter.

"You want this?" she spits, letting her weight settle on it. The tortured metal groans. It all happened so fast the girls inside haven't had time to get over the shock, let alone try to escape.
15322.title: Attack of the chavs!

choices: You get away but dropped the bus!
153221.content: You have to do something. You punch the smirking girl in the leg and grab the bus as her foot lifts. In a second you are up and making a break for it. Think rugby and hope you do better in real life. You dodge the first two girls, and easily run past the third girl. You are about to make your escape, when the black girl with the boots punches you hard in the face.
153221.title: Hero

choices: There are more survivors in the storm drain!
1532211.content:
You go down, and the tiny yellow bus tumbles out of your hands onto the pavement.

The Asian girl who had before done nothing quickly springs into action and kicks you in the balls with her sneaker. You yell out and pain and curl up into a ball.

You look up just in time to see the white girl standing over you. She blows you a kiss, and then you watch in horror as her massive shoe comes down on your face, breaking your nose.

You've just officially had your ass kicked by girls...

Meanwhile, the occupants of the damaged bus come to their senses and begin to exit onto the pavement. Some scurry around in fear not knowing which way to go. The Bus driver leads the calmer ones into a drain where they may be safer. The rest of the girls are too afraid or too hurt to leave the bus and stay inside.

Unfortunately, they do not have much time, because the giant teenage girls feel you've learned your lesson and end their pummeling.

"Let's smash his toy bus!", says the black girl with the big Reeboks.

"Wait! You don't know what you..." You yell out, but it is too late. The black girl's enormous Reebok comes down hard, crushing the bus and its remaining occupants as flat as a pancake.

Blood drips from your nose, as you lay there in pain. You can see that some of the tiny girls managed to escape, and are wandering around on the asphalt. "I'm sorry," your mind says as you watch them move about.

The giant girls, meanwhile, decided their work was done and you watch them walk off, crushing a few of the tiny girls beneath their feet. You lay there for a few minutes until the pain diminished. Finally, you get up and notice...
1532211.title: Beat up by girls

15322111.content:
You look around desperately for survivors from the massacre. Your nose is throbbing and still gushing blood, but protecting the girls is more important. There are a few on the ground probably in shock and then you look over the curb and see to your relief that about a dozen of them have made it down a dip in the curb to the gutter. Luckily it's a dry day or they'd have been swept away.

You crouch low and try to be the least intimidating you can be for a giant. "I'm so sorry," you say, "I tried to stop them! Can you climb onto my hand and I'll lift you back onto the pavement?"

A few comply nervously but the rest are unsure, so you put the others down near you resume shhing and trying to calm them down.

You are so preoccupied you hear the footsteps too late!
15322111.title: Rescue from the gutter
